::Shadow Wing::

She smiled at Lunarpine and held out her hand, trying to touch his 
face.  She gently glided her fingers over his cheek and gave him a 
warm smile. She was happy that she could as least touch him and know 
that he felt real to her.  She looked into his eyes, and fell in love 
all over again with him.
